name: Demonic (Horned)
description:
Amber Alert!

A demon and a rogue robot have escaped captivity, if you happen to spot one of these indivuals Report! Report! Report!

in this short platformer game, the second in the one-word series you play as a cloud

but beware this game is not what it seems

Content Warning! 

Flashing lights and Loud noises are common in this game

there is also supposed murder 

Controls:

Arrow keys/ move and jump

find the mirror on each level

other games in this series - https://horned0.itch.io/vision
